task.title: Logging in to the
task.shortdesc: Log in to the to verify the installation of and to administer the messaging server.

taskbody.prereq: Ensure that the and messaging server containers are both running by using the docker ps command.

context.p: This task uses the URL https://127.0.0.1:9087 to connect to the . To use this URL, your container must be running on the same machine as your browser.

You need to accept an certificate and an server certificate before you can start using the to administer the messaging server. Both of these certificates must be changed if you move from a non-production to a production environment.

step.cmd: Open an Internet Explorer 11, Firefox, or Chrome browser and connect to the by entering the following URL:
Accept the certificate so that you can view the login page.
Log in and accept the server certificate in one of the following ways:

choices.choice:
If you are using Internet Explorer 11, complete the following steps to log in and accept the server certificate:
At the login prompt, type the default ID and password (admin/admin ) and click Log in.
The Get started with IBM IoT MessageSight Web UI page is displayed. You can use this page to specify the connection configuration details for the first server that you want to manage. For more information about configuring your first server, see .
The Common configuration and customization tasks section of the homepage is displayed.

If you are using Firefox or Google Chrome, complete the following steps to log in and accept the server certificate:
At the login prompt, type the default ID and password (admin/admin ) and click Log in.
The Get started with IBM IoT MessageSight Web UI page is displayed. You can use this page to specify the connection configuration details for the first server that you want to manage. For more information about configuring your first server, see .
After you are logged in, the error Cannot connect to the IBM IoT MessageSight server might be displayed if you have not accepted the server certificate.
Expand the error message and click Click here in the expanded message text. An error page is displayed that indicates that you need to accept the certificate.
Follow the browser prompts to accept the certificate. The About IBM IoT MessageSight page is displayed in a new browser window.
Return to the IBM IoT MessageSight Web UI page. If the error box is still displayed, refresh the page.
The Common configuration and customization tasks section of the homepage is displayed.

taskbody.postreq: You can use the to verify your installation of and to administer the messaging server. For more information about verifying your installation, see the Verifying the installation of IBM IoT MessageSight topic in the documentation in IBM Knowledge Center. For more information about using the to administer the messaging server, see the Administering section of the documentation in IBM Knowledge Center.
